initPath.name: initPath
initPath.summary: Sets all the different paths' properties.

getAppPrefix.name: getAppPrefix
getAppPrefix.summary: Returns the current app's prefix if any.

getAppPath.name: getAppPath
getAppPath.summary: Returns the current app's full path (with src/ at the end if raw if false).

getCurPath.name: getCurPath
getCurPath.summary: Returns the web public path of the app.

getLibPath.name: getLibPath
getLibPath.summary: Returns the full path of the libraries (vendor folder).

getDataPath.name: getDataPath
getDataPath.summary: Returns the full path of the data; if plugin is provided gives the path for the plugin's data.

getTmpPath.name: getTmpPath
getTmpPath.summary: Returns the full path of the temp data; if plugin is provided gives the path for the plugin's temp data.

getLogPath.name: getLogPath
getLogPath.summary: Returns the full path of the logs.

getCachePath.name: getCachePath
getCachePath.summary: Returns ths full path of the cache

getContentPath.name: getContentPath
getContentPath.summary: Returns the full path of the content data; if plugin is provided gives the path for the plugin's content data.

getPluginUrl.name: getPluginUrl
getPluginUrl.summary: Returns the URL part of the given plugin.

getPluginPath.name: getPluginPath
getPluginPath.summary: Returns the path of the given plugin.

getUserTmpPath.name: getUserTmpPath
getUserTmpPath.summary: Returns path for the user's temp dir

getUserDataPath.name: getUserDataPath
getUserDataPath.summary: Returns path for the user's dir

includeModel.name: includeModel

getCookie.name: getCookie

addAuthorizedRoute.name: addAuthorizedRoute
addAuthorizedRoute.summary: Add a route to authorized routes list if not already exists.

addForbiddenRoute.name: addForbiddenRoute

isAuthorizedRoute.name: isAuthorizedRoute
isAuthorizedRoute.summary: Checks if a route is authorized.

setRoot.name: setRoot
setRoot.summary: Sets the root of the application in the URL (base href).

getRoot.name: getRoot
getRoot.summary: Returns the root of the application in the URL (base href).

includePhpView.name: includePhpView

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: This should be called only once from within the app

arguments.name: db
arguments.description: An array of routes usually defined in /_appui/current/cfg/routes.json

destory.name: destory

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether a corresponding file has been found or not.

pluginName.name: pluginName

reroute.name: reroute
reroute.summary: This will reroute a controller to another one seemlessly. Chainable

addToViews.name: addToViews

getView.name: getView

viewExists.name: viewExists
viewExists.summary: Checks whether the given view exists or not.

modelExists.name: modelExists
modelExists.summary: Checks whether the given model exists or not.

getExternalView.name: getExternalView
getExternalView.summary: This will get a view from a different root.

getPluginFromComponent.name: getPluginFromComponent
getPluginFromComponent.summary: Retrieves the plugin's name from the component's name if any.

routeComponent.name: routeComponent
routeComponent.summary: Retrieves component's data from the given plugin name if exists.

customPluginView.name: customPluginView
customPluginView.summary: Retrieves a view of a custom plugin.

customPluginModel.name: customPluginModel
customPluginModel.summary: Retrieves a model of a custom plugin.

hasSubpluginModel.name: hasSubpluginModel
hasSubpluginModel.summary: Returns true if the subplugin model exists.

subpluginModel.name: subpluginModel
subpluginModel.summary: Get a subplugin model (a plugin inside the plugin directory of another plugin).

getModel.name: getModel
getModel.summary: This will get the model; there is no order for the arguments.

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: Data to send to the model

getPluginModel.name: getPluginModel

getSubpluginModel.name: getSubpluginModel

getCachedModel.name: getCachedModel
getCachedModel.summary: This will get the model as it is in cache if any and otherwise will save it in cache then return it

setCachedModel.name: setCachedModel
setCachedModel.summary: This will set the model in cache

deleteCachedModel.name: deleteCachedModel
deleteCachedModel.summary: This will unset the model in cache

addInc.name: addInc
addInc.summary: Adds a property to the MVC object inc if it has not been declared.

process.name: process
process.summary: Returns the rendered result from the current mvc if successfully processed
process.description: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

description_parts.content: process() (or check()) must have been called before.

hasContent.name: hasContent
hasContent.summary: Checks if the controller has content.

transform.name: transform
transform.summary: Transform the output object on Controller instance given a callback

output.name: output

setPrepath.name: setPrepath

getRoutes.name: getRoutes

getInstance.name: getInstance
getInstance.summary: Returns the instance of the singleton or null.

singletonExists.name: singletonExists
singletonExists.summary: Returns true if the instance as been initiated.

pluginDataPath.name: pluginDataPath

userTmpPath.name: userTmpPath

userDataPath.name: userDataPath

tags.description: An external object that can be filled after the object creation and can be used as a global with the function add_inc
